title: RELIC: A SciFi Adventure
description: For fans of Michael Crichton, A.G. Riddle, and James Rollins.All Jordan Carver wanted to do was drift through Europe and decide what to do with his life. But when the American student surprisingly inherits a flat from an old Professor he barely knew, he suddenly is hunted by assassins and caught up in an adventure that will lead him around the globe in a hunt for a relic that could alter human history ... or end it.The new stand-alone adventure novel by T.S. Falk, the author of the acclaimed Ancient Secrets series.
author: T.S. Falk
